mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge, memberMobile) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
select id, memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge, memberMobile from member_table where memberEmail = #{loginEmail}
